name: Platforming with Tonight's host: Dr. MacGyver
name_original: Platforming with Tonight's host: Dr. MacGyver
description:
It's a platforming adventure with your pal Dr. McGyver!

I bashed together some old project files to create platformer as bit of mental recovery project for Global Game Jam 2021. It's not really that great.

Absolutely none of the images represent how it looks.

Do not pay for this.

Cheers for my pal Vatix for giving hand with graphical stuff.

Web build comes back later after it's fixed, and maybe toss some cut features back.
